summary: A quirky British Secret Service Agent named Major Hammond tries to discover who is using a secret weapon to steal experimental planes.
cast: Laurence Olivier|Ralph Richardson|Valerie Hobson|George Curzon|George Merritt|Gus McNaughton|David Tree|Sandra Storme|Hay Petrie|Frank Fox|George Butler|Gordon McLeod|John Longden|Ronald Adam|Patrick Aherne|Eileen Bennett|Wallace Bosco|Leslie Bradley|Henry Caine|Noel Dainton|Mark Daly|Roy Emerton|Derek Farr|David Farrar|Ian Fleming|Morland Graham|Sally Gray|Allan Jeayes|Colin Keith-Johnston|Franklyn Kelsey|John Laurie|Herbert Lomas|Raymond Lovell|Miles Malleson|Gertrude Musgrove|Reginald Purdell|John Robinson|John Singer|Lewis Stringer|Gregory Stroud|Jack Vyvyan|Hal Walters
director: Directors: Tim Whelan, Arthur B. Woods (uncredited)
title: Ondas misteriosas
